lyrics.text: Sometimes you tell me nights are hard without me
You want me to believe you that easy?!
You are not you, Something is off about you
Since when you ask me when met
The one with a breave heart
In a blink, you have become someone else. What's with you?
Where is the love? The passion?
Sometimes you tell me nights are hard without me
You want me to believe you that easy?!
You have become very calm, wise
Your heart isn't breave as it used to be
You ahve become romantic and your words are sweet
I don't hear the word No anymore
Someone tell me, Is that a dream or reality?
The one with a breave heart
اكدب عليا واسرح بيا وقولي بحبك انا
وشويه شويه تقولي الليله في بعدي بالف سنه
وعايزني اصدق كل ده كله كده بسهوله
انت مش انت في حاجه غريبه ومش طبيعيه بقى
طيب من امتى انت بتسالني امتى ما بينا لقا
سبحان من غير بقى احوالك مش معقوله
بقى حد تاني في غمضة عين طب ايه جرالو
اكدب عليا واسرح بيا وقللي بحبك انا
وشويه شويه تقولي الليله في بعدي بالف سنه
وعايزني اصدق كل ده كله كده بسهوله
بقى عندك ذمه وزي النسمه وهادي وراسي اوي
وبقدره قادر مبقاش قلبك عامل فيها اوي
ده اتحول 180 درجه كده في دقيقه
بقى ليك في الرقه وكل كلامك بقى متنقي كده
ومفيش ولا لأه بقيت اسمعها وايه بقى هوه كده
طب حد يقولي ده حلم بجد دا ولا حقيقه
فين .. فين اللي كان متفرعن فين
And from your eyes I must have my heart back
You turned my world upside down and from high above
And from your eyes I must have my heart back
You appear once and disappear a thousand times
I wish I could see meet and see you once
My heart vowed to you and him and I are standing
Come down with your heart from you eyes and look at him
You turned my world upside down and from high above
You're playing oh enough for a bit
If you're normal try and come near it's no offense
And I won't leave you and one day I'll bring you
و من عيونك لازم اخد قلبي
و من عيونك لازم اخد قلبي
انا نفسي اقابلك او اشوفك بس مره
انزل بقلبك من عيونك اديلو نظره
لو انت عادي جرب قصادي هنا اهو تعدي
You came back to say I'm your drug
oh I wish it was that way
But you know I know better
for a girl who would be pleased by it
You're not for me anymore , I'm not your muse
It's just that Loving you drains me
because I seriously don't need it
it was my thing but now it's not
now be gone and leave me
I'm not going back not even if you're dying
I don't want to hear your voice
where were you when I wanted it
and I knew all what you hid
and now I'll never look to you the same way
ده احنا اللي فات دفنينو سوا
make me understand how your living it on me
you were close living for me
and you used to think of me three days
saty by your self if you don't like i will walk away and that's your problem
i loved you but i found you diffrent than your words (x2)
your used to talk . how your actting busy for
i will do it with you and i will leave you
it's look like iam going to miss you who everycome take me
i will go and i wont wite
you wern't dreaming whne you saw me .
sometime you here and somtime you there(x2)
this eye will leave before this eye , go and see which way are you going
and see how is going to ask about you after me
that's enough i broght the end and what's comingwill come again
your used to talk . how your actting busy for
i will do it with you and i will leave you
it's look like iam going to miss you who everycome take me
i will go and i wont wite
you wern't dreaming whne you saw me .
sometime you here and somtime you there(x2)

englishTranslations.title: IT LOOKS LIKE IAM GOING TO MISS YOU

lyrics.text: وكان في الويم بتفكر فيا 3 ايام
خليك مع نفسك لو مش عاجبك
هو انت كنت تطول فهامني ازاي على مين عامل مشغول
هاعملها معك وهاسيبك ما تيلا اطلع من دول
ده ماكنتش تحلم بس تشوفني ليه بامارة ايه عارفني
عامل ايه اما هنا وياما هناك م العين دي هسيبك قبل العين دي
ويلا بقا السكة الل تودي وشوف مين بعدي فبعدي هيجي ويسال فيك
وكفاية كده عشان جبت اخرها ويلا بناقص خيرها في غيرها
ويوم هتفكر تاني تشوفني هاقول بعينك
Yes, it's true, I was content with anything with you1
Neglect, distance, cruelty, I'd still love you
But, honestly, I'm tired, it's flooding me and I've come to hate you
I was wrong to love you with my heart and my feelings
I ignored my mind and ignored everyone's opinion
Don't say 'I love you, let's get back together.' - I've already woken up
Get away, don't force my hand
And I, I died for you
I don't know what to say to you
Just go, I hope God forgives you for what has happened to me
Matrimony is not taken for granted except by the cheater and the liar
And the memories are not forgotten except by the one who sold it all and left
And the lesson is useless except to the one who was hurt and abandoned
And I learnt my lesson and, from you, the lesson wasn't free
And I'm savvy, don't worry about me, I really cannot forget
Never will I forget that you forgot me - don't say 'my love'
أيوا صحيح أنا كنت راضية بأي حاجة معاك
تهملني تبعد عني تقسى عليه أنا حباك
لكن الصراحة زهقت فاض بيا وبقيت كرهاك
عقلي لاغيته وكنت لاغية رأى كل الناس
متقولش حبيتك ونرجع أصل فوقت خلاص
روح ربنا يسامحك على اللي أنا فيه
والذكريات مابينسهاش غير اللي باع أو ساب
والدرس مابينفعش غير اللي اتجرح واتساب
وأنا خدت درس ومنك اتعلمت مش ببلاش
وأنا شاطرة متخافش عليا بجد أنا مابنساش
عمري ماهنسى إنك نسيتني حبيبتي ماتقولهاش
It's as if my ending with you is repeated, and can be written by any author.
You'll leave me, walk away, know someone else, build your life and have kids.
As if I never meant anything in your life, in any day back then.
OK, but at least keep something of me, a picture, a gift, anything.
Get a girl and name her after me, to remind you of me.
Don't make me feel that I was just an experience and that's it.
As for me not being with you,
I feel that I'll never forget you.
My feeling halted my life, and overflew me already.
I will not do as you and lie to people.
It's not fair really that I be unjust to someone and live not caring.
Whenever I think about what was between us, I figure out it's not much.
What we reached, was never in my mind, never had I imagined it.
I couldn't believe I found you, but I'm not destined to live comfortably.
The difference between you and me is clear, I'll stay alone.
I'm not selfish, I can never stomp on someone who's dying, and just leave.
You'll regret one day and eventually that your tears can't bring what's has already ended.
وكأن نهايتي معاك متعاده يكتبها اي مؤلف
هتسيبني وتمشي وتعرف غيري وتبني حياه وتخلف
وكأنى مكنتش شيء في حياتك في يوم من الايام
طب سيب حاجه مني صوره هديه اي حاجه ليا
جيب بنت وسميها على اسمي تفكرك بيا
اما انا بقى طول ما انا مش وياك
احساسي اني انا عمري ما هنساك
مش هعمل زيك واكدب على ناس
مش عدل بجد اني اظلم حد عشان اعيش والسلام
انا كل ما افكر في اللي ما بينا للدرجادي قليل
ده اللي وصلنالو مكنش في بالي عمري ما كنت اتخيل
ده انا كنت ما صدقت اني لقيتك مش مكتوبلي ارتاح
الفرق واضح بيني وبينك اني انا هبقى لوحدي
انا مش انانيه لا يمكن ادوس على حد يموت وانا اعدي
مسيرك تندم يوم ما دموعك متجيبش اللي راح
اما انا بقى طول ما انا مش وياك
احساسي اني انا عمري ما هنساك
مش هعمل زيك واكدب على ناس
مش عدل بجد اني اظلم حد عشان اعيش والسلام المصدر
You hurt me, I turn back to you
Neither thought you once of making me happy,
nor even told me a nice word.
You promised me more than once
that one day you will relieve all my pains1
If you really want to help me
then kill me. It would be better for me.
You, who misuses his power (on me), forgetting
that for every strong man, there is someone that is stronger2
who lived his life in a wrong way3
You are being very unjust with me.
You are abusing me so much.
And my poor heart can not
go on after all what it suffered.
You, who misuses his power, forgetting
that the Almighty knows and is witnessing everything.
He gives you another chance, but never forgets your deeds.4 You know this.
I'm depending on God to get me my revenge from you
for all (the suffer) I'm living in.
"It is better to be the one that receives the injustice
that to be the one who commits it"5
but I keep lying on myself6
saying that maybe there are some good in you
Years passed, and I'm still with you
I didn't ask where would this lead me
just told myself to leave it on God
Beyemhel bassy mabyehmelshe howa wenta fahem
Ba oul yemken yekoon feek kheir
انه القوي في اللي اقوى منه
بيمهل بس ما بيهملش هوه وانت فاهم
